title: Fujifilm X-M5 review — impressive astro in a small package
description: Being the lightest and smallest camera in the X-series line-up, I was impressed with how good this little camera was for astrophotography.
content: Being the lightest and smallest camera in the X-series line-up, I was impressed with how good this little camera was for astrophotography.
